Fecal incontinence subtyped three clinical subtypes : urge fecal incontinence , passive fecal incontinence , fecal seepage . Urge incontinence refers loss fecal matter spite active attempt retain content ; passive incontinence refers involuntary loss stool without awareness . Despite clinical distinction fecal incontinence subtypes , pathophysiology subtypes know . Existing practice guideline recommend categorize patient subtypes , evaluate symptom severity patient-reported outcome , assess function anorectal complex image physiologic test best tailor management option . Although framework subtyping fecal incontinence exists , specific association subtypes clinical , anatomic , physiologic finding woman pelvic floor disorder well delineate .
